summary:
El próximo 25 de enero llega a las salas esta película con Saoirse Ronan y Margot Robbie.
 Lpelícula explorará la turbulenta...
body:
El próximo 25 de enero llega a las salas esta película con Saoirse Ronan y Margot Robbie.

Lpelícula explorará la turbulenta vida de la carismática María Estuardo, reina de Francia a los dieciséis años y viuda a los dieciocho, que rehúsa volver a casarse a pesar de las numerosas presiones. Prefiere regresar a Escocia para ocupar el trono que le pertenece. Sin embargo, tanto Escocia como Inglaterra están gobernadas por la persuasiva Isabel I. Cada joven reina se siente fascinada por su “hermana”. Rivales en el poder y en el amor, y reinas en un mundo gobernado por hombres, las dos sopesan el matrimonio y la independencia. Estreno el 25 de enero de 2019.

Josie Rourke debuta en la dirección con un guion adaptado por Beau Willimon. Como ya hemos dicho, la película estará protagonizada por Saoirse Ronan y Margot Robbie, con Jack Lowden, Joe Alwyn, Martin Compton, Brendan Coyle y Guy Pearce completando el reparto. Aquí os dejamos los pósters  e imágenes que han salido a la luz hasta el momento.

#PÓSTER | #MaryQueenOfScots: Pósters de sus dos protagonistas, Saoirse Ronan y Margot Robbie @Universal_Spain @focusfeaturesES El próximo 25 de enero llega a las salas esta película con Saoirse Ronan y Margot Robbie.

tags: The Road to the Thirteenth Doctor
summary:
It’s time to start down the road that leads to the Thirteenth Doctor with a brand new epic adventure from Titan Comics.
...
body:
It’s time to start down the road that leads to the Thirteenth Doctor with a brand new epic adventure from Titan Comics.

Starring the Tenth Doctor, as portrayed by David Tennant, this is the first of three spin-off adventures leading to the launch of the Thirteenth Doctor’s, as portrayed by Jodie Whittaker, own comic series.

Written by James Peaty & Jody Houser with art by Iolanda Zanfardino & Rachael Stott, the Tenth Doctor has his work cut out when he encounters a lost spaceship… Whose crew is being absorbed by mysterious ghostly creatures! Everything is not how it seems, however, especially when disturbing facts about the crew come to light!

Each issue contains a serialised short from the creative team behind the new Thirteenth Doctor ongoing series!

Titan Comics’ Doctor Who – The Road to the Thirteenth Doctor – The Tenth Doctor is available to buy now from all good comic book shops and digitally via Comixology.

Out Now: Titan Comics’ The Road to the Thirteenth Doctor – The Tenth Doctor It’s time to start down the road that leads to the Thirteenth Doctor with a brand new epic adventure from Titan Comics.

summary: Imagine: The Doctor telling you it’s time for him to regenerate
body:
Imagine: The Doctor telling you it’s time for him to regenerate

The Doctor entered the TARDIS, he walked up towards you as he took off his trenchcoat, you could see pain in his eyes. You shook your head as he stopped in front of you. “Doc, you okay?”


The Doctor frowned. “It’s time Y/N.”


“Time? No…no.” You said in disbelief.


The Doctor nodded and, pulls your small figure into a hug. “I’m sorry Y/N…”
